spotInfo.hazards: Shallow areas, swimmers in summer, fishing nets

spotInfo.description: Well-known village spot with strong kitesurfing community and schools.

spotInfo.description: Famous spit in Puck Bay dividing shallow lagoon from deeper waters.

spotInfoPL.description: Słynna mierzeja w Zatoce Puckiej dzieląca płytką lagunę od głębszych wód.

spotInfo.description: Small village spot on Hel with shallow, safe lagoon area. There's paid car parking area.

spotInfoPL.description: Mała wioska spot na Hel z płytki, bezpieczny laguna area. There's paid car parkwg area.

spotInfo.hazards: Port nearby, may be busy in summer

spotInfo.description: Baltic Sea spot with wave riding potential and lagoon on the other side.

spotInfoPL.description: Mlubze Bałtyckie spot z wave ridwg potential i laguna na the other side.

spotInfo.description: Wave spot on the Baltic coast with the big, wide sandy beach and campsite nearby.

spotInfoPL.description: Spot falowy na the wybrzeże Bałtyku z the big, szeroki siy plaża i campsite nearby.

spotInfoPL.description: Mlubze Bałtyckie wave spot, mniej zwłocznay than Łeba lub Jastrzębia Góra.

spotInfo.description: Challenging wave spot under cliffs, suitable only for experienced kiters.

spotInfoPL.description: Challengwg wave spot under cliffs, suitable naly dla experienced kiters.

spotInfoPL.description: Spot falowy na the east wybrzeże Bałtyku, szeroki plaża but often zwłocznay.

spotInfo.description: One of the widest beaches in Poland, good for wave riding.

spotInfoPL.description: One of the szerokist plażaes w Poli, good dla wave ridwg.

spotInfo.hazards: Shallow areas, seaweed, gusty winds near forest
spotInfo.description: Polish island on the Baltic, flat water lagoons and open sea. Good summer spot with variable wind directions.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Płytkie obszary, seaweed, gusty winds near forest
spotInfoPL.description: Polish isli na the Baltic, flw woda lagunas i open mlubze. Good summer spot z variable wwd directinas.

spotInfo.hazards: Variable gusty winds, trees on the shore, narrow entrance to the water, wind shadows in the entrance with eastern winds, rocky bottom on the left from the entrance
spotInfo.description: Large reservoir in Silesia, one of the best kite spots in the southern Poland.
spotInfo.llmComment: The best wind is SW, S is also good, but we can kite with E wind as well, but on the west side of the lake where launch area is very limited and there are hazards like concrete elements in the water

spotInfoPL.hazards: Zmienny porywisty wiatr, drzewa na brzegu, wąskie wejście do wody, cienie wiatrowe przy wejściu z wiatrem wschodnim, skaliste dno po lewej stronie od wejścia
spotInfoPL.description: Duży zbilubnik w Silesia, nae of the best kite spots w the southern Poli.

spotInfo.hazards: Trees on shore, gusty wind, wind shadow behind the pier
spotInfo.description: Opole region lake popular with local windsurfers and kiters.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Trees on shore, gusty wind, wind shadow behind the pier
spotInfoPL.description: Opole regina jezilubo popular z local wwdsurfers i kiters.

spotInfo.hazards: Mountains cause gusts, small area for the launch, wind shadows during the launch and behind the port, current from the river
spotInfo.description: Mountain river transforming into the lake with gusty but strong wind, used by local kiters. It's possible to kitesurf there with the pure southern winds only (S). Wind blows between the mountains causing Venturi Effect. Therefore wind can be 8-10 knots stronger than the predicted forecast.
spotInfo.llmComment: kitesurfing is possible only with the S wind causing venturi effect. When S wind is blowing it is usually at least 5-10 knots stronger than the predicted forecast

spotInfoPL.hazards: Mountains cause gusts, small area for the launch, wind shadows during the launch and behind the port, current from the river
spotInfoPL.description: Mountaw river transdlamwg wdo the jezilubo z gusty but strnag wwd, used by local kiters. It's possible do kitesurf there z the pure southern wwds naly (S). Wwd blows between the mountaws causwg Venturi Effect. Theredlae wwd can be 8-10 knots strnager than the predicted dlaecast.

spotInfo.hazards: Gusty winds, small launch area, trees near the shore
spotInfo.description: Large lake near Wrocław, popular for water sports.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Porywisty wiatr, mały obszar startu, drzewa blisko brzegu
spotInfoPL.description: Large jezilubo near Wrocław, popular dla woda splubts.

spotInfo.hazards: Trees on shore, swimmers, gusty winds
spotInfo.description: Lakes in Dąbrowa Górnicza. The best lakes for kiting there are Pogoria III and Pogoria IV.

spotInfo.hazards: Swimmers in summer, gusty wind, trees near the shore.
spotInfo.description: Lake in Silesia with clean water, suitable for local kite sessions.  it's possible to kite there comfortably with the pure western (W) wind only.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Swimmers latem, gusty wind, trees near the shore.
spotInfoPL.description: Lake w Silesia z czysta woda, suitable dla local kite sessinas.  it's possible do kite there comdlwably z the pure western (W) wwd naly.

spotInfo.hazards: Swimmers in summer, gusty wind, trees near the shore, fishermen, possible issues with the water cleanliness. The best wind is NW, but we can kite with E wind as well, but on the west side of the lake where launch area is very limited and there are hazards like concrete elements in the water

spotInfo.llmComment: Kitesurfing on the beach spot is possible only with the NW wind. You can kite with E wind as well, but on the west side of the lake where launch area is very limited and there are hazards like concrete elements in the water.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Trees near the shore, wind shadows during the entrance, pier, concrete elements

spotInfo.description: Biggest reservoir in central Poland, good winds and large area. Depending on the wind direction, we can choose spots on two sides of the lake - Popów or Zaspy

spotInfoPL.description: Biggest reservoir w central Poli, good wwds i large area. Dependwg na the wwd directina, we can choose spots na two sides of the jezilubo - Popów lub Zaspy

spotInfo.launch: Grassy and sandy areas, easy access
spotInfo.hazards: Shallow areas, underwater vegetation, local fishing nets
spotInfo.description: One of the most popular flat-water kite spots near Dziwnów. Ideal for learning and freestyle sessions thanks to large shallow lagoon protected from waves. Works best with western and northern winds.

spotInfoPL.launch: Traway and sandy areas, easy access
spotInfoPL.hazards: Płytkie obszary, underwater vegetation, local sieci rybackie
spotInfoPL.description: One of the most popular flw-woda kite spots near Dziwnów. Ideal dla learnwg i freestyle sessinas thanks do large płytki laguna protected od fale. Wlubks best z western i nlubthern wwds.

spotInfo.launch: Grassy shore near Lubiatowo and Nowęcin, easy access and parking
spotInfo.hazards: Shallow areas, reeds, occasional gusty wind due to surrounding trees
spotInfo.description: Lake Sarbsko near Łeba offers flat water conditions ideal for beginners and freestyle riders. Works best with western and northern winds. The nearby Baltic coast provides wave riding options for advanced kiters.

spotInfoPL.launch: Traway shore near Lubiatowo and Nowęcin, easy access and parking
spotInfoPL.hazards: Płytkie obszary, reeds, occasional gusty wind due to surrounding trees
spotInfoPL.description: Lake Sarbsko near Łeba offers flw woda cnaditinas ideal dla begwners i freestyle riders. Wlubks best z western i nlubthern wwds. The nearby wybrzeże Bałtyku provides wave ridwg optinas dla advanced kiters.

spotInfo.type: Lake, choppy to flat water depending on wind
spotInfo.launch: Grassy or sandy beaches near Smardzewice and Bronisławów
spotInfo.hazards: Trees near shore, variable gusts, fishermen and boats
spotInfo.description: Large artificial lake in central Poland, offering good kitesurfing conditions with steady western and northern winds. Multiple launch points available along the shore, especially near Bronisławów and Smardzewice.

spotInfoPL.type: Jezioro, wzburzona to płaska woda depending on wind

spotInfo.launch: Grassy or rocky shore near Bukówka village, limited space
spotInfo.hazards: Cold water, sudden gusts, narrow launch area, submerged rocks
spotInfo.description: Small reservoir located in the Sudetes mountains near Lubawka, offering scenic views and strong, gusty winds. Suitable mainly for experienced riders due to variable wind and limited launch area.

spotInfoPL.launch: Traway or rocky shore near Bukówka village, limited space
spotInfoPL.hazards: Cold water, sudden gusts, narrow launch area, submerged rocks
spotInfoPL.description: Small reservoir locwed w the Sudetes mountaws near Lubawka, offerwg scenic views i strnag, gusty wwds. Suitable mawly dla experienced riders due do variable wwd i limited launch area.

spotInfo.hazards: Very shallow, muddy bottom, may be gusty
spotInfo.description: One of the most famous inland kite spots in Europe with shallow water and strong, reliable wind. During the season, you need to pay for the entrance to the spot or use burgenland karte offered bye some hotels.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Very shallow, muddy bottom, may be gusty
spotInfoPL.description: One of the most famous wli kite spots w Europe z płytki woda i strnag, reliable wwd. Durwg the mlubzesna, you need do pay dla the entrance do the spot lub use burgenli karte offered bye some hotels.

spotInfo.description: Quiet alternative to Podersdorf with same shallow water conditions.

spotInfoPL.description: Quiet alternwive do Podersdlubf z same płytki woda cnaditinas.

spotInfo.hazards: Shallow and muddy water, deep water near port
spotInfo.description: Flat water paradise in the Curonian Lagoon with famous Fenas kite spot, very popular in Baltic region. We have campsite for tents and campers here. There is also marina with modern houses for the rent.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Shallow and muddy water, deep water near port
spotInfoPL.description: Flw woda paradise w the Curnaian Lagona z famous Fenas kite spot, very popular w Baltic regina. We have campsite dla tents i campers here. There is also marwa z modern houses dla the rent.

spotInfo.launch: Wide sandy beach between Palanga and Šventoji
spotInfo.hazards: Shorebreak, strong current in NW winds, beachgoers during summer season
spotInfo.description: Monciškės (often called Jūratė or Jura spot) is a Baltic Sea kitesurfing location north of Palanga. Offers steady winds, clean waves and wide sandy beach, making it great for freeride and wave sessions. Works best with westerly or north-westerly winds and is less crowded than central Palanga beaches.

spotInfoPL.launch: Szeroka plaża piaszczysta between Palanga and Šventoji
spotInfoPL.hazards: Shorebreak, strong current in NW winds, beachgoers during summer season
spotInfoPL.description: Mnaciškės (often called Jūrwė lub Jura spot) is a Mlubze Bałtyckie kitesurfwg locwina nlubth of Palanga. Offers steady wwds, clean fale i szeroki siy plaża, makwg it grew dla freeride i wave sessinas. Wlubks best z westerly lub nlubth-westerly wwds i is mniej zwłocznay than central Palanga plażaes.

spotInfo.launch: Wide grassy beach with easy access and parking
spotInfo.hazards: Shallow areas, soft mud bottom, occasional algae
spotInfo.description: Häädemeeste is one of Estonia’s best flat-water kitesurfing spots located on the Gulf of Riga coast. The shallow lagoon and consistent westerly winds make it ideal for freestyle and beginners. Calm and uncrowded area with stunning sunsets over the bay.

spotInfoPL.launch: Wide grassy plaża with easy access and parking
spotInfoPL.hazards: Płytkie obszary, soft mud bottom, occasional algae
spotInfoPL.description: Häädemeeste is nae of Estnaia’s best flw-woda kitesurfwg spots locwed na the Gulf of Riga coast. The płytki laguna i cnasistent westerly wwds make it ideal dla freestyle i begwners. Calm i unzwłocznay area z stunnwg sunsets over the bay.

spotInfo.type: Island – mix of wave and flat-water spots
spotInfo.launch: Multiple sandy and grassy beaches around the island – Ristna, Luidja, and Kärdla are popular access points
spotInfo.hazards: Cold water early/late in the season, seaweed, rocks near some launches
spotInfo.description: Hiiumaa is Estonia’s kitesurfing paradise offering both wave and flat-water conditions depending on the coast. Ristna on the west side is famous for clean Baltic waves, while Luidja Bay provides sheltered flat water for freestyle and beginners. Consistent winds, beautiful nature and low crowds make it one of the top Baltic kite destinations.

spotInfoPL.type: Island – mix of wave and flat-water spots
spotInfoPL.launch: Multiple sandy and grassy plażaes around the island – Ristna, Luidja, and Kärdla are popular access points
spotInfoPL.hazards: Cold water early/late in the season, seaweed, rocks near some launches
spotInfoPL.description: Hiiumaa is Estnaia’s kitesurfwg paradise offerwg both wave i flw-woda cnaditinas dependwg na the coast. Ristna na the west side is famous dla clean Baltic fale, while Luidja Bay provides sheltered flw woda dla freestyle i begwners. Cnasistent wwds, beautiful nwure i low crowds make it nae of the dop Baltic kite destwwinas.

spotInfo.description: Inland Czech lake spot, calm and good for practice. Two spots - Sejki Beach and Mala Laguna, which we can choose depending on the wind direction.

spotInfoPL.description: Inli Czech jezilubo spot, calm i good dla practice. Two spots - Sejki Beach i Mala Laguna, which we can choose dependwg na the wwd directina.

spotInfo.description: Inland Czech lake spot. Depending on the wind direction, we can choose spot near Žluťák, Yacht Club (south) or Kitespot u drátů (north)

spotInfoPL.description: Inli Czech jezilubo spot. Dependwg na the wwd directina, we can choose spot near Žluťák, Yacht Club (south) lub Kitespot u drátů (nlubth)

spotInfoPL.description: Wlubld-famous flw woda laguna w Sicily, ideal dla freestyle trawwg.

spotInfoPL.description: One of the most icnaic kite bays w Sardwia z reliable wwd.

spotInfo.description: Beautiful alpine lake spot with reliable thermal winds. Wind will be stronger than in the global forecast due to the mountain region. It works mostly during the summer due to the termal winds.

spotInfoPL.description: Beautiful alpwe jezilubo spot z reliable thermal wwds. Wwd will be strnager than w the global dlaecast due do the mountaw regina. It wlubks mostly durwg the summer due do the termal wwds.

spotInfo.description: Kitesurf capital of Europe with powerful Levante and a bit lighter Poniente winds. There are a few kite spots: Balneario (small, for pros, no rescue), Rio Jara (wide beach, rescue boats), and Valdevaqueros. It's recommended to buy Sea Rescue package in case of riding in Levante wind. When the wind is too strong (over 40 kts) and your are not professional big air kitesurfer, it's recommended to visit Palmones spot, where wind will be around 20-25 kts at the same time.

spotInfoPL.description: Kitesurf capital of Europe z powerful Levante i a bit lighter Pnaiente wwds. There are a few kite spots: Balneario (small, dla pros, no rescue), Rio Jara (szeroki plaża, rescue bows), i Valdevaqueros. It's recommended do buy Sea Rescue package w case of ridwg w Levante wwd. When the wwd is doo strnag (over 40 kts) i your are not professinaal big air kitesurfer, it's recommended do visit Palmnaes spot, where wwd will be around 20-25 kts w the same time.

spotInfo.description: Flat water alternative to Tarifa during strong Levante wind.

spotInfoPL.description: Flw woda alternwive do Tarifa durwg strnag Levante wwd.

spotInfo.description: Wave spot near Tarifa, good alternative when Tarifa is too strong.

spotInfoPL.description: Spot falowy near Tarifa, good alternwive when Tarifa is doo strnag.

spotInfo.description: Huge flat water lagoon, great for freestyle and beginners.

spotInfoPL.description: Huge flw woda laguna, grew dla freestyle i begwners.

spotInfo.hazards: Waves, shorebreak, rocks on downwind side
spotInfo.description: World-famous Canarian spot, reliable trade winds, mix of chop and waves. Popular for both windsurfing and kitesurfing.

spotInfoPL.hazards: Waves, shorebreak, rocks on downwind side
spotInfoPL.description: Wlubld-famous Canarian spot, reliable trade wwds, mix of chop i fale. Popular dla both wwdsurfwg i kitesurfwg.

spotInfoPL.description: Huge siy laguna z offshlube wwds i tidal pools. Słynny kitesurfwg venue, home do Wlubld Cup events.

spotInfo.description: Huge tidal beach, perfect for freeride and buggy/kite landboarding too. Water close to the shore is flat and shallow. Further we can expect small to medium waves. You can drive the car on the beach. The beach itself is MASSIVE!

spotInfo.description: Hura Beach, located near Esparaido in the Ceará region, Brazil, offers consistent trade winds and an open ocean exposure. It's ideal for kite-enthusiasts looking for strong wind and freedom on the beach, rather than flat-water lagoons.

spotInfo.description: Jericoacoara, or simply 'Jeri', is one of the most iconic kitesurfing and windsurfing destinations in Brazil. It offers steady trade winds, warm water, and long wave sections ideal for downwinders and wave riding. The spot has a vibrant atmosphere with many kite schools, beach bars, and consistent 20–30 knot winds nearly every day during the season.

spotInfo.description: Guajiru is a relaxed fishing village on the Ceará coast, north of Flecheiras and south of Baleia. It offers steady 20–30 knot trade winds, long sandy beaches, and ocean conditions ideal for freeride and wave sessions. Popular for downwind trips and quiet atmosphere compared to nearby hotspots like Jericoacoara and Ilha do Guajiru.

spotInfo.type: Sea and lagoon – choppy to flat water

spotInfo.description: Cumbuco is one of Brazil’s most famous kitesurfing destinations, located just 30 km west of Fortaleza. Known for its consistent trade winds, warm water, and easy beach access, it offers both ocean and lagoon riding. Perfect for beginners, freestyle riders, and downwinders along the Ceará coast, with a lively kite community and excellent infrastructure.

spotInfo.description: Lagoa de Cauípe is the legendary flat-water lagoon located just a few kilometers north of Cumbuco, Brazil. Known worldwide as one of the best freestyle training spots, it offers butter-flat water and steady 20–30 knot trade winds almost every day in season. Ideal for freestyle, beginners, and pro riders alike, with ocean access just beyond the sand dune.

spotInfo.description: Barra Grande, located in the state of Piauí, is one of Brazil’s top kitesurfing destinations. It offers consistent trade winds, tidal lagoons with flat water for freestyle, and open ocean for downwinders. The charming fishing village has a laid-back vibe, boutique pousadas, and a vibrant kite community. Perfect for all levels and long kite sessions in steady 20–30 knot winds.
